pkgmetadata.longdescription: Moderated Nonlinear Factor Analysis // Conducts moderated nonlinear factor analysis (e.g., Curran et al., 2014, doi:10.1080/00273171.2014.889594). Regularization methods are implemented for assessing non-invariant items. Currently, the package includes dichotomous items and unidimensional item response models. Extensions will be included in future package versions.
